Question.Subject: How do I get back to Firefox 3.5?
Question.Content: I came back to my computer to find that 3.6 was up, tried it, and my skin wasn't compatible with it. Along with other troubles, I don't see it being worth it. How can I set it so that I can get back on previous versions of firefox?
Question.ChosenAnswer: go to http://www.oldversion.com/Mozilla-Firefox.html scroll down to the bottom download the file to your desktop remove the current version and finally install the new(old) version

Answer.Content: go to http://www.oldversion.com/Mozilla-Firefox.html scroll down to the bottom download the file to your desktop remove the current version and finally install the new(old) version
